lines.text:
[as Sherlock Jr., riding on the handlebars of a motorcycle, unaware the driver fell off]
Be careful or one of us will get hurt.

Don't try to do two things at once and expect to do justice to both. This is the story of a boy who tried it. While employed as a moving picture operator in a small town theater he was also studying to be a detective.
I lost a dollar. Did you find it?
lines.character: Girl Who Loses Dollar Outside Cinema

lines.text:
[points to the trash pile]
In there?

lines.character: Girl Who Loses Dollar Outside Cinema

lines.text:
[nods reluctantly, pulls it out]
Describe it.

lines.character: Girl Who Loses Dollar Outside Cinema
Girl Who Loses Dollar Outside Cinema

lines.text: [he checks again, she makes a bird with her hands, he checks and hands it over]

[to Sherlock Jr. about a man locked in a tight cage]
That's a detective. When he's dead I'll put you in there.
We are lost! He is sending for the world's greatest detective - Sherlock Jr.!
Say Mr. Detective, before you clean up any mysteries, clean up this theater!
